1370: Pelegrim moved to Die lange straet3.E.0 after marriage.
Got married to Folqui at age 18 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Folqui, Folqui, at age 18.
1371: Had a son with Folqui, Dybben, at age 19.
1372: Had a daughter with Folqui, Ghodelde, at age 20.
1373: Had a son with Folqui, Oudrauen, at age 21.
1374: Had a son with Folqui, Euerocker, at age 22.
1376: Had a daughter with Folqui, Leanne, at age 24.
1377: Lost his wife Folqui while she was giving birth to Hildeburgis in 1377.
Became caretaker of Folqui, Dybben, Ghodelde, Oudrauen, Euerocker, Leanne, Hildeburgis at age 26.
